plugin.name: ðŸ§© Supernote by Ratta Sync - Unofficial
plugin.description: Supernote Sync Unofficial allows you to fetch and sync notes and tasks from the Supernote E-Ink tablet by Ratta into NotePlan.
plugin.author: ariccb
plugin.requiredFiles-NOTE: If you want to use HTML windows, remove the '-EDIT_ME' ABOVE

plugin.commands.name: Say Hello from ariccb.SupernoteSyncUnofficial! (change this to your own command)
Fetch all synced lines codes in NotePlan Notes
plugin.commands.description: prints all of the currently used codes for synced lines in NotePlan, to make sure manually created synced lines are not conflicting

plugin.commands.name: Supernote to Noteplan Sync
plugin.commands.description: Process all of the Supernote .note files in your Supernote's Note directory and place recognized text and converted images to the appropriate NotePlan notes

plugin.commands.name: Supernote Tasks Sync
plugin.commands.description: Process all of the Supernote's Tasks and place them in today's NotePlan note, with a generated synced line code

plugin.commands.name: Supernote by Ratta Sync - Unofficial: Version
onMessageFromHTMLView
plugin.commands.description: ariccb.SupernoteSyncUnofficial: Callback function to receive messages from HTML view

plugin.commands.name: Supernote by Ratta Sync - Unofficial: Update Plugin Settings

plugin.settings.title: Supernote by Ratta Sync - Unofficial Settings
Image format to use: either 'png' or 'pdf'
plugin.settings.description: The image files that get created from converting the .note files get embedded in the NotePlan notes. This setting determines the format of the image files.

plugin.settings.title: Inbox Path
plugin.settings.description: Path to the inbox directory in the notes application that will be used to place notes that were in the parent folder of the Supernote notes.

plugin.settings.title: File Extension
plugin.settings.description: File extension used for notes in the application.

plugin.settings.title: Storage Path
plugin.settings.description: Path to the storage directory in the notes application.

plugin.settings.title: Supernote Parent Storage Path
plugin.settings.description: Path to the parent storage directory in the Supernote application.

plugin.settings.COMMENT: This is for use by the editSettings helper function. PluginID must match the plugin.id in the top of this file

plugin.settings.title: A string in prefs
plugin.settings.description: Enter some string and see it change when the plugin is run
plugin.settings.default: This default setting was set in plugin preferences!

plugin.settings.NOTE: DO NOT CHANGE THE FOLLOWING SETTINGS; ADD YOUR SETTINGS ABOVE ^^^

plugin.settings.title: Log Level
plugin.settings.description:
Set how much logging output will be displayed when executing Supernote by Ratta Sync - Unofficial commands in NotePlan Plugin Console Logs (NotePlan -> Help -> Plugin Console)

 - DEBUG: Show All Logs
 - INFO: Only Show Info, Warnings, and Errors
 - WARN: Only Show Errors or Warnings
 - ERROR: Only Show Errors
 - none: Don't show any logs
